trans-unit.source: A trigger action that changes the speed of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Azione trigger che modifica la velocità di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively control a storyboard's speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> azione con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> per controllare in modo interattivo il rapporto di velocità di uno storyboard.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio> per specificare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> la velocità dell'animazione in rapporto di velocità dell'animazione precedente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> a 2, si raddoppia la velocità del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animazioni e se si imposta un valore pari a 0,5, si riduce la velocità del 50%.

trans-unit.source: This object affects the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> at anytime after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> begins.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto influisce sul <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> a in qualsiasi momento dopo il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> inizia.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pause the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> and use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio>, when you resume the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, it uses the new speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si posiziona il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> e utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio>, quando si riprende il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, viene utilizzato il nuovo rapporto di velocità.

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, which controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Piuttosto, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> deve fare riferimento il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, che controlla il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Sospendere, riprendere, arrestare o controllare in modo interattivo uno Storyboard

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> impostato in modo interattivo, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> proprietà di relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> oggetto (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) di controllo da riferimento relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una nuova velocità dell'animazione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> in rapporto alla precedente velocità di animazione.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per specificare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> la velocità dell'animazione in rapporto di velocità dell'animazione precedente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> a 2, si raddoppia la velocità del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animazioni e se si imposta un valore pari a 0,5, si riduce la velocità del 50%.
